source.0a1e7bc1: It looks like there are images with no salts. So, What happen if I post NO MASK prediction. Here, I try it.
source.3090c37e:
This submission file scores 0.38 on public LB. At this time I post this kernel, the organizer don't anounce how the no salt images scored. But I guess that if I no-mask-prediction to no-mask-images scores 1,0 and any-mask-prediction to no-mask-images scores 0.0. And also no-mask-prediction to any-mask-images scores 0.0.  0.38 must means 38% of public test images has no salt. 
So this factor may makes this competition crazy!!
